"The Lost Boys" features an outstanding cast, including Barnard Hughes, Jami Gertz, Jami Gertz, Alex Winter, Dianne Wiest, Dianne Wiest, Jason Patric, Jason Patric. The film was well-received by critics and audiences alike.

In summary, "The Lost Boys" and "Count Dracula" are both excellent vampire movies that should not be missed by any fans of this genre.
